avionics: Avionics, IMU, barometer, algorithms, aircraft compliance verification
cameras: Forward vision sensors, FPV camera, FPV gimbal motor
operation: Mission radius, restricted altitudes or zones
propulsion: ESCs, motors, vibrations, arms not securely fastened
RF: SDR radio communication between remote control and drone, GNSS, RTK
spraying: Weight sensor, liquid level sensor, pumps, flow meter, solenoid valves, centrifugal nozzles
